2022/06/27 v1.0.8
If the input path is local. Ask user to open it as it is

2022/05/25 v1.0.7
When UNC is converted, A dialog will be shown asking user to open it
If input is Directory, the dialog does not appear

2022/05/24 v1.0.6
Ask user if the input path converted to a local path
Add HighDPI support
